name: Blue Piano
description:
Blue is cool! Tap only the blue tiles! Don't touch the white piano keys!

Why play only with black piano keys? Have more fun with the Blue Piano! Blue is cool! :D

3 addictive game modes:
- Classic: Tap on the blue tiles as fast as you can.
- Arcade: Don't let any blue tile left untapped!
- Zen: How many blue tiles can you tap in 20 seconds?
